entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming east 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 51 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow and local blowing snow beginning early in the afternoon. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
